markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">[Symphony of the Unfettered Heart](/Spells.aspx?ID=733)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** you or 1 ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your symphony lifts listeners from their worldly concerns. Attempt a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) one of the following conditions affecting the target: [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33), [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35), or [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36). If you fail, you can't target that effect on the target for 1 day. Use the condition's source to determine the counteract DC (for example, the [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) DC for grabbed).

---
**Heightened (9th)** You can target up to four creatures.
name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart

summary_markdown: Your symphony lifts listeners from their worldly concerns.
text: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 228 2.0 Cast Two Actions verbal, somatic Range 30 feet Target you or 1 ally --- Your symphony lifts listeners from their worldly concerns. Attempt a Performance check to counteract one of the following conditions affecting the target: grabbed, immobilized, paralyzed, restrained, slowed, or stunned. If you fail, you can't target that effect on the target for 1 day. Use the condition's source to determine the counteract DC (for example, the Escape DC for grabbed). --- Heightened (9th) You can target up to four creatures.
